It will automate restoration of this modified iso to original TECHNET 2011/04/12 "fr_windows_7_ultimate_with_sp1_x64_dvd_u_677299.iso", with genuine SHA1 & ISO/CRC as SHA1 : 5370BB44F497E1B19114C7CF70F5CDEF9F3A2582
and ISO/CRC : 4AA2D9BB.
